{{ardayearheader|Year of the Trees 1449|Year of the Trees 1450|Year of the Trees 1479|Year of the Trees 1490|Year of the Trees 1492|Year of the Trees 1495|Year of the Trees 1496}}

* The judgement of [[Fëanor]] before the [[Valar]]; [[Melkor]]'s lies are revealed.<ref name="AA">{{AA|99-100}}</ref>
* [[Fëanor]] sentenced to exile for 12 years;<ref>{{MR|P2k}}, note 10</ref> [[Finwë]] his father goes to exile with him. They build a stronghold at [[Formenos]] and hide the [[Silmarils]] in an iron vault.<ref name="AA"/>
* [[Fingolfin]] becomes the ruler of the [[Noldor]] in [[Tirion]].<ref name="AA"/>
* [[Tulkas]] goes after Melkor, but Melkor casts a shadow about himself and goes into hiding.<ref name="AA"/>
